The dimensions of this part are as follows: - Length: 0.75 units - Width: 0.375 units - Height: 0.75 units The description of this part is as follows: - Shape: A three-dimensional rectangular prism with a slightly tapered top and bottom. - Length: 0.75 units - Width: 0.375 units - Height: 0.75 units *(Note: Instructions for the remaining parts of the CAD assembly will follow in subsequent sections.)*</description>

prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The sides are parallel, and the top and bottom faces are perpendicular to the sides. The dimensions of the prism are 3 units in length, 2 units in width, and 1 unit in height.
